author: Justin Kroll, Variety
description: Joss Whedon will take over on "Justice League" so that Zack Snyder can be with his family.
title: Director Zack Snyder is leaving 'Justice League' after his daughter's suicide

author: Terri Schwartz
description: Zack Snyder and his wife Deborah Snyder have opened up about the personal tragedy prompting them to exit production on Justice League.
title: Zack Snyder Exits Justice League After Family Tragedy; Joss Whedon to Finish Film - IGN
